name: herbivorous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of an animal) eating plants: The iguanadon was a herbivorous dinosaur. Gorillas are primarily herbivorous, eating leaves and stems of shrubs. See
herbivore
More examplesFewer examplesRabbits are relatively large, wild, herbivorous mammals.The plants have been attacked by herbivorous insects.Herbivorous animals can thrive on plant protein alone.It seems rather odd that cows, who are herbivorous, should be fed offal.
